channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Climate Change Doesn’t Care What You Think About It

item.title: WATCH: Congressional Republicans huddle on strategy, Trump agenda
item.description: Congressional Republicans are working to hash out a legislative strategy as the Trump administration takes shape.

item.title: The New Fusionism of Wanting to Blow Stuff Up
item.description: Adherents may be from the right or left, but they share an overriding belief that ‘experts’ and elite institutions have royally messed things up.

item.description: Customers are duping merchants into issuing refunds even if they receive and keep their products.

item.title: Trump fires two Democratic commissioners on civil rights enforcement agency as White House targets DEI
item.description: The White House fired Democrats Charlotte Burrows and Jocelyn Samuels from the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC), they each said.

item.title: Why Congress Needs To Swiftly Pass Concealed-Carry Reciprocity
item.description: Unlike other parts of the Constitution, the Second Amendment has been politicized to the point it is often treated as a second-class right.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Should Vote No on RFK
item.description: HHS is too important a position for the Senate to confirm a pro-abortion secretary.

item.description: Whether you’re leading a team or climbing your own Everest, focusing on the journey will get you further than obsessing over the destination.

item.title: DeepSeek used OpenAI’s model to train its competitor using ‘distillation,’ White House AI czar says
